panel.field: This hack now changes the file extension in the bitmaps to whatever 3-character name you want it to be. Be wary of possible conflicts if you rename them to something typically read by other programs.

WARNING: Booster's Lab is designed to automatically rename modified bitmap files back to .bmp. To avoid frustration, keep backups of the modified bitmaps inside your data folder prior to reapplying the hack.
